name: Monaco Solicitors
slogan: Aiding employees in finding a fair deal when they leave their jobs
description:
Our team is the most accomplished and senior team of specialist employee-side lawyers in the UK. We do not use any junior or trainee lawyers, so you will always be properly advised. Each and every member of our legal team is an outstanding lawyer armed with the knowledge and credentials to overcome employers in settlement negotiations and court cases.

Although based in London, we represent clients right across the UK, as we’re able to carry out all  communications via 'phone and email. The only time when it is necessary to travel is to attend courts & tribunals, and we are happy to do this when needed, but the vast majority of our cases settle out of court before they get to that stage.

team.name: Alina Bar
team.bioHtml: From the team that brought you monacosolicitors.co.uk, this is a fantastic opportunity to make a difference and bring legal services up to date using tech.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description:
**Role: Full stack developer
Employer: Monaco Solicitors
Location: London, peckhamlevels.org (with home working)
Type: full time permanent or 4 days per week
Pay: £60k+ depending on experience **

From the team that brought you monacosolicitors.co.uk, this is a fantastic opportunity to make a difference by sharing knowledge, opening up the law to the average person, and bringing legal services up to date using tech. Most people have never used a lawyer (other than perhaps for conveyancing) and we want to change that, ideally on a global scale.

We are working on many ideas including for example a dashboard which allows the user to update their case details on an ongoing basis and be presented with next steps, which adapt to match the latest case updates. Next steps could include writing a certain type of legal letter with specific content. Using a freemium model, users could request assistance from a human lawyer at any point. 

You’ll be working with a dynamic and forward thinking startup team, with teamwork and open discussion, especially for problem solving, and we also really encourage health and wellness and 9-530 working hours. 

The product team currently consists of 1 full stack front end dev (Github here), 1 junior dev and 2 designers plus a product owner. To give you a little sneak peek of what you will be building, our app will feature the following:

Artificial intelligence legal advice
Automatic case assessment and provision of advice
Tailored content served to user based on their case
Lawyer and user profiles 
Calendar booking system with availability
Cloud stored documents/paperwork
Provision of advice from Lawyer in paid sessions, including video call
Payment gateway


**Skills Required**
React
Javascript, ES6+
NodeJs
5 years plus experience 
AWS 

**Responsibilities**
Coding (minimum 90% of the role)
Analysing requirements and coming up with appropriate solutions
Project management, agile / scrum 

**Nice to have**
Solutions architect experience
DevOps
Project and product management
Building PWA (progressive web apps)
React Native


**Benefits**
Pension scheme
Opportunity to work from home 
Creative office space
Gym membership
Onsite yoga classes, table football and table tennis
Social gatherings (including Friday beers) and a collaborative environment
Entrepreneurial spirit
Non corporate
Making a tangible difference in the world

**Location**
We are based in the creative hub of Peckham Levels, a 1 minute walk from Peckham Rye station, which is 9 minutes by train from London Bridge, 15 minutes from Victoria & Clapham Junction, and 24 minutes from St Pancras.
